programme.title: Asia Squawk Box S1
programme.desc: CNBC's flagship show covering the opening of the Asian markets, and all the latest business news.

programme.title: Street Signs S1
programme.desc: Street Signs provides CNBC's viewers with the latest updates on business all over the globe. The program focuses on the day's market action, presents perspectives by prominent analysts, investors, executives and business sharks. Track the stock market openings, be the first to get the real-time insights and current view of stocks, take a chance to capitalize on the plays of the day.

programme.title: Capital Connection S1
programme.desc: Capital Connection delivers the latest developments from Asia's markets, and primes traders for the Middle East and European trading day. An hour of market scrutiny that gives investors and traders the necessary information to make the best possible decisions.

programme.title: Squawk Box Europe S1
programme.desc: CNBC presents its flagship show revolving around the world of business, and business issues. Focusing on the European markets, the show's anchors invite leading business executives for open conversation and debate, as well as policymakers and financial strategists to provide their vision and commentary on the key points on the market.

programme.title: The Edge (Inside Nestle) S1 (n°74)
programme.desc: «Inside Nestle»CNBC's Julianna Tatelbaum gets special access to Nestlé's research and development facility in Lausanne, Switzerland where teams are working to protect value chains, increase sustainability and create the products of the future.

programme.title: The Edge (Assistive Tech) S1 (n°75)
programme.desc: «Assistive Tech»CNBC's Arabile Gumede explores the latest technologies designed to assist people with disabilities.

programme.title: La fièvre du dollar (Generous with Other People's Money) S1 (n°55)
programme.desc: «Generous with Other People's Money»Billionaire Tom Petters was a respected CEO for more than a decade. His companies included iconic American brands like Polaroid, Sun Country Airlines, and Fingerhut. But these legitimate businesses were purchased with dirty money...and his reputation was built on a foundation of lies.

programme.title: La fièvre du dollar (Baby Broker Scam) S1 (n°54)
programme.desc: «Baby Broker Scam»Kevin Cohen is an attorney who says he can make dreams come true for couples desperate for children. He promises babies ... for a hefty price. But unknown to his trusting clients, Cohen is exploiting their hopes and dreams.

programme.title: Hysan Development S1
programme.desc: Christine Tan heads to Hong Kong to talk to Irene Lee, chairman of Hysan Development, one of the city's largest property developers. She finds out how the century-old family business began and how it came to dominate the commercial real estate space in Causeway Bay.

programme.title: Kuehne+Nagel S1
programme.desc: Christine Tan speaks exclusively to Kuehne+Nagel's CEO, Stefan Paul, to find out how he plans to grow the Swiss-based transportation and logistics group.

programme.title: La fièvre du dollar (Major League Fraud) S1 (n°53)
programme.desc: «Major League Fraud»Nevin Shapiro is the conman at the center of a college football scandal. He kicked off the controversy with stunning stories of gifts to players and allegations of broken NCAA rules. Who is this man who jeopardized the future of the University of Miami's football team, and how did he steal the millions that made it all possible?

programme.title: La fièvre du dollar (Master of Deadly Deceit) S1 (n°52)
programme.desc: «Master of Deadly Deceit»Carlos Perez-Olivo is a successful lawyer with a silver tongue and solid gold taste. But when he's disbarred for fleecing desperate clients, he finds another way to make money...and proves how greed really is a deadly sin.

programme.title: The CNBC Debate S1
programme.desc: From the Asian Development Bank's annual meeting, CNBC's Chery Kang talks to experts about what it will take to achieve net zero targets in Asia.

programme.title: N. R. Narayana Murthy S1
programme.desc: He's been described as the father of India's IT sector. N.R. Narayana Murthy, the Founder of one of the largest IT companies in the country, Infosys, sits down for The CNBC Conversation.

programme.title: La fièvre du dollar (Naked Greed: Celebrity Scam Artist) S1 (n°51)
programme.desc: «Naked Greed: Celebrity Scam Artist»Kenneth Ira Starr is a money manager. He courts celebrity client?Sylvester Stallone, Uma Thurman, and Wesley Snipes. But Starr doesn't stop there. He steals $30 million to buy his way onto Hollywood's A-list and live a life of luxury ... all in the name of love.

programme.title: La fièvre du dollar (Mark Weinberger: Nose No Bounds) S1 (n°50)
programme.desc: «Mark Weinberger: Nose No Bounds»Dr. Mark Weinberger-a self-proclaimed "nose doctor"-has it all and isn't afraid to flaunt it. But inside The Weinberger Sinus Clinic, all is not what it seems.

programme.title: Sustainable Future S1
programme.desc: Can Nuclear energy be the solution to combatting the climate crisis? A new documentary, "Nuclear Now", makes the case for atomic energy.

programme.title: Renee Fleming S1
programme.desc: CNBC's Tania Bryer meets American soprano Renée Fleming to learn about her career and her tireless campaign to further the understanding that music can have our lives and bodies.

programme.title: La fièvre du dollar (The Wizard of Sarasota) S1 (n°49)
programme.desc: «The Wizard of Sarasota»Arthur Nadel conjures a $330 million hedge fund. In the blink of an eye, he disappears and leaves clients without their life savings.

programme.title: La fièvre du dollar (Les fausses créances de Me Dreier) (48/51)
programme.desc: «Les fausses créances de Me Dreier»Marc Dreier is a high-powered lawyer with celebrity clients. But Dreier is a conman and steals more than $700 million from hedge funds.

programme.title: The CNBC Debate S1
programme.desc: From the Asian Development Bank's annual meeting, CNBC's Chery Kang talks to experts about what it will take to achieve net zero targets in Asia.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S10
programme.desc: Jimmy Fallon with guests, and musical performance.

programme.title: NBC Nightly News
programme.desc: Join American journalist Lester Holt as he provides a comprehensive report on the latest national and international stories, featuring interviews with the relevant persons involved in the day's news. Lester and his guests offer adept analysis to help you make sense of the frantic stories emerging from the world of politics, economics and social issues. Nightly News also features a segment titled Making a Difference, where we celebrate ordinary Americans doing extraordinary deeds to benefit their surrounding local communities.

programme.desc: CNBC's flagship show covering the opening of the Asian markets, and all the latest business news.
